title: FS - T206 John Titus Sweet Caporal 350! The 'Stache!
author: njdunkin1

posts.post_title: FS - T206 John Titus Sweet Caporal 350! The 'Stache!
posts.post_content:
[url=http://postimg.org/image/fw2ac3z61/][img]http://s28.postimg.org/fw2ac3z61/215.jpg[/img][/url]
Card has been sold!
1909-11 T206 Sweet Caporal John Titus! The 'Stache! Awesome little piece of art of a very popular card, with a nice back too. I am working on another deal to purchase this card in similar format, so I am no longer in need of this one.
Card is in poor condition but looks great in person - looks like it would grade out as "Authentic" or maybe a 1. It has some creases, retains some round corners, has a few marks above his head (looks possibly like dirt or old ink.) $45 delivered (add 2.54 for s+h) , PP f+f, takes this home today in a nice bubble mailer. 
I can provide additional scans if needed.

Card will ship safely in a nice case and in a bubble mailer, will send via First Class mail.
If you have any questions please ask!

Yeah, I thought you just picked this up last week or so.
Hope the other deal goes through, but I would have waited until I had the upgrade in hand. Just me, I guess.
Best of luck NJ.

[quote name="xplainer" post=1529871]Yeah, I thought you just picked this up last week or so.
Hope the other deal goes through, but I would have waited until I had the upgrade in hand. Just me, I guess.
Best of luck NJ.[/QUOTE]

Appreciate it xplainer, much obliged. The other Titus I have just been waiting on, the seller has been out of town for a spell. Hoping that one goes through, but if not there are plenty of fish in the sea. I'm sure I'll have many more opportunities to pick one up :)
-NJ
